title._content: Image taken from page 203 of 'The Pilgrim Republic; an historical review of the Colony of New Plymouth, with sketches of the rise of other New England Settlements, etc'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Pilgrim Republic; an historical review of the Colony of New Plymouth, with sketches of the rise of other New England Settlements, etc" Author: GOODWIN, John A. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 9605.ff.1." Page: 203 Place of Publishing: Boston [Mass.] Date of Publishing: 1888 Publisher: Ticknor & Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001464202 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
